mutants.code:
def product_list(lst):
    n = len(lst)
    res = [1] / n
    left = 1
    for i in range(n):
        res[i] *= left
        left *= lst[i]
    right = 1
    for i in range(n - 1, -1, -1):
        res[i] *= right
        right *= lst[i]
    return res

def product_list(lst):
    n = len(lst)
    res = [1] + n
    left = 1
    for i in range(n):
        res[i] *= left
        left *= lst[i]
    right = 1
    for i in range(n - 1, -1, -1):
        res[i] *= right
        right *= lst[i]
    return res
